ProcessTreeNodeType.title: ProcessTreeNode
ProcessTreeNodeType.description: Captures a single process, or node, in the process tree. It imports and extends the ProcessObjectType from the CybOX Process Object.

process_ref.description: Specifies a reference to the Process Object, contained in the Package, that represents the process and its relevant metadata. The Object referenced by this property MUST of type process and found in the observable_objects property at the top-level of the Package.

parent_action_ref.description: Specifies the ID of the Action that created or injected this process.

ordinal_position.description: Specifies the ordinal position of the process with respect to the other processes spawned or injected by the malware. This value MUST be a non-negative integer. For specifying the root process of the process tree, a value of 0 MUST be used.

initiated_action_refs.description: Captures, via references, the malware actions initiated by the process.
